name: Duck factory (Toaster_on_mass)
description:
A game made for the JUICE JAM

A game where you are making ducks in a duck factory, and you can't stop due to the clock

Controls: Mouse

Yes, my thought process went from "Don't stop" to "Duck factory"

This is the game I put the most juice in, ever, and made the sound effects (except for two, sfxr, running out of time), and also made all the art (not the font tho)

My friend, Jeffery, made the music

Used this shader because I cannot shader https://godotshaders.com/shader/positioned-shockwave/

Definitely going to take what I learned from juiciness here to make better games, because my games lack juice
